attributes.action: Take a stand and to provide more support against Child Abuse In our Neighborhoods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is clear that people are horrified with what has been going on with the killings of Baby P and of the two small chikdren Killed on 12/11/2008. 

We need Volunteers to work alongside local Authorities.

Child Abuse awareness Schemes for our towns and villages.

Local Government funding to provide training to volunteers.
